typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Date of birth2} as string,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Title as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		Location as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		{Account Name} as string,
		{English Name} as string,
		Acronym as string,
		{Account Type} as string,
		{Account Sub-Type} as string,
		{Office Address: Country} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Parent Account} as string,
		Confidential as string,
		Activity as string,
		Product as string,
		{Women Managed} as string,
		{Youth Managed} as string,
		{Social media} as string,
		{Other emails} as string,
		{Other phone numbers} as string,
		{Other information} as string,
		{Ownership and management} as string,
		{Trade Forum} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Office Address: City} as string,
		{Office Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing address is equal to office address} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Mailing Address: City} as string,
		{Mailing Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Country} as string,
		{UN Mailing Format} as string,
		{Project Number} as string,
		Salutation as string,
		Account as string,
		Phone as string,
		{Preferred Language} as string,
		{Use account address} as string,
		{Event title} as string,
		{Event type} as string,
		{Course name} as string,
		{Start date} as string,
		{End date} as string,
		{Event date} as string,
		{SME Trade Academy} as string,
		SheTrades as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1000) ~> srcALL
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM1
source(output(
		MAX_VAL as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select IsNULL(Max(ENTITY_ID),0) MAX_VAL\nFROM MART_OWNER.DIM_ENTITY',
	format: 'query') ~> ExistingDIMMax
srcALL filter({Professional status}!='Self-employed/ freelancer') ~> FilterProfessionalStatus
FilterProfessionalStatus select(mapColumn(
		Email,
		{Phone number},
		{Organization/ Company name},
		{Professional status},
		{BSO ownership},
		{Office Address},
		City,
		{Post Code},
		Website,
		Twitter,
		LinkedIn,
		Address,
		Cityname,
		Region,
		Postalcode,
		Cityregion,
		{Name of the entity},
		{Account Name},
		{Office Address: Country},
		Category,
		Confidential,
		{Social media},
		{Other emails},
		{Other phone numbers},
		{Other information},
		{Office Address: Street 1},
		{Office Address: Street 2},
		{Office Address: City},
		{Office Address: State/Province},
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Street 1},
		{Mailing Address: Street 2},
		{Mailing Address: City},
		{Mailing Address: State/Province},
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Country},
		{UN Mailing Format},
		Account,
		Phone,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqCol
SelectReqCol derive(ENTITY_NAME = case(isNull({Organization/ Company name})==false(),
     {Organization/ Company name},
     isNull({Name of the entity})==false(),
     {Name of the entity},
     isNull(Account)==false(),
     Account,
     isNull({Account Name})==false(),
     {Account},
     ''),
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME = substring(Email, instr(Email, '@')+1),
		ADDRESS = case(isNull(Address)==false(),
     Address,
     isNull({Office Address})==false(),
     {Office Address},
     isNull({Office Address: Street 1})==false(),
     {Office Address: Street 1},
     ''),
		CITY = case(isNull(City)==false(),
     City,
     isNull(Cityname)==false(),
     Cityname,
     isNull({Office Address: City})==false(),
     {Office Address: City},
     ''),
		REGION = Region,
		PHONE_NUMBER = {Phone number},
		WEBSITE = Website,
		TWITTER = Twitter,
		LINKEDIN = LinkedIn,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP = {BSO ownership},
		POST_CODE = case(isNull({Post Code})==false(),
     {Post Code},
     isNull(Postalcode)==false(),
     Postalcode,
     isNull({Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code})==false(),
     {Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
     ''),
		POBOX = {Office Address: Street 2},
		CITY_REGION = case(isNull(Cityregion)==false(),
     Cityregion,
     isNull({Office Address: State/Province})==false(),
     {Office Address: State/Province},
     ''),
		CATEGORY = Category,
		CONFIDENTIAL = Confidential,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA = {Social media},
		OTHER_EMAILS = {Other emails},
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS = {Other phone numbers},
		OTHER_INFORMATION = {Other information},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 = {Mailing Address: Street 1},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 = {Mailing Address: Street 2},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY = {Mailing Address: City},
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE = {Mailing Address: State/Province},
		MAILING_POST_CODE = {Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		MAILING_COUNTRY = {Mailing Address: Country},
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN = {UN Mailing Format}) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS = DerivedColumn1@ADDRESS,
		CITY = DerivedColumn1@CITY,
		REGION = DerivedColumn1@REGION,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		WEBSITE = DerivedColumn1@WEBSITE,
		TWITTER = DerivedColumn1@TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN = DerivedColumn1@LINKEDIN,
		SOURCE,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		POBOX,
		CITY_REGION,
		CATEGORY = DerivedColumn1@CATEGORY,
		CONFIDENTIAL = DerivedColumn1@CONFIDENTIAL,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
		MAILING_POST_CODE,
		MAILING_COUNTRY,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDIM
SelectDIM aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_NAME),
	each(match(name!='ENTITY_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> AggDistinct
AggDistinct derive(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CITY,
REGION,
PHONE_NUMBER,
WEBSITE,
TWITTER,
LINKEDIN,
SOURCE,
BSO_OWNERSHIP,
POST_CODE,
POBOX,
CITY_REGION,
CATEGORY,
CONFIDENTIAL,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
OTHER_EMAILS,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
MAILING_POST_CODE,
MAILING_COUNTRY,
MAILING_FORMAT_UN)) ~> SourceHASHRecords
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestRecord
ExistingDIM, LatestRecord join(ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID == LatestRecord@ENTITY_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestRecord@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(EXISTING_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CITY,
REGION,
PHONE_NUMBER,
WEBSITE,
TWITTER,
LINKEDIN,
SOURCE,
BSO_OWNERSHIP,
POST_CODE,
POBOX,
CITY_REGION,
CATEGORY,
CONFIDENTIAL,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
OTHER_EMAILS,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
MAILING_POST_CODE,
MAILING_COUNTRY,
MAILING_FORMAT_UN)) ~> ExitingHASHRecords
SourceHASHRecords, SelectExiting exists(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD == EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, SelectExiting lookup(ENTITY_NAME == EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
ExitingHASHRecords select(mapColumn(
		EXISTING_ENTITY_SR_KEY = ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		EXISTING_ENTITY_ID = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID,
		EXISTING_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
		EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME = ENTITY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExiting
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord keyGenerate(output(NEW_ENTITY_ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1, ExistingDIMMax join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxID
JoinMaxID derive(ENTITY_ID = MAX_VAL+NEW_ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXISTING_VERSION_NO+1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
RunInfo2 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		REGION,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		WEBSITE,
		TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		POBOX,
		CITY_REGION,
		CATEGORY,
		CONFIDENTIAL,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
		MAILING_POST_CODE,
		MAILING_COUNTRY,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = EXISTING_ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		REGION,
		{PHONE NUMBER} = PHONE_NUMBER,
		WEBSITE,
		TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		POBOX,
		CITY_REGION,
		CATEGORY,
		CONFIDENTIAL,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
		MAILING_POST_CODE,
		MAILING_COUNTRY,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY1
